channel.title: Takunda Madechangu
channel.description: Takunda is a Full-Stack Software Developer by profession, he enjoys solving different kinds of problemns so he can provide value to different kinds of people .

item.title: Is your Paynow integration failing? Here is how to fix it
item.description: Sometimes your integration may not always work out of the box. Here are some tips to help you fix it.
item.author: takunda.madechangu@gmail.com (Takunda Madechangu)

item.title: Paynow Integration Part 5a - Checking for payments
item.description: If you don't check and verify your payments your customers can buy things for free from you.(PHP)
item.author: takunda.madechangu@gmail.com (Takunda Madechangu)

item.title: Paynow Integration Part 4a - PHP Integration
item.description: So we have finished the boring part now lets integrate Paynow into our project(PHP).
item.author: takunda.madechangu@gmail.com (Takunda Madechangu)

item.title: Paynow Integration Part 3 - Installation
item.description: After getting the keys the next stage is to install Paynow library or SDK.
item.author: takunda.madechangu@gmail.com (Takunda Madechangu)

item.title: Paynow Integration Part 2 - Getting Keys
item.description: The first step to integrate Paynow into your app is getting keys. Without the keys you can't accept payments.
item.author: takunda.madechangu@gmail.com (Takunda Madechangu)

item.title: Paynow Integration Part 1 - Intro
item.description: Ever wondered how you can recieve payments on your website? Well read on to find out how you can do that using Paynow.
item.author: takunda.madechangu@gmail.com (Takunda Madechangu)
